title: Deriving Neutron Star Equation of State from AdS/QCD
abstract: arXiv:2403.20240v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: Neutron stars are among the main targets for gravitational wave observatories, however, their equation of state is still not well established. Mainly phenomenological models with many parameters are widely used by far, while theoretical models are not so practical. In arXiv:1902.08477, a theoretical equation of state with only one parameter is derived from Witten-Sakai-Sugimoto model, as an application of AdS/QCD, where pointlike instanton case is taken into consideration. When the tidal deformability constraint from gravitational wave event is satisfied, the maximum mass is about 1.7 solar masses. Now we upgrade this model to instanton gas, with one more variable, the instanton width. This is not naively a free parameter, but a function of the chemical potential. Thus we end up with a more complicated and accurate model, but still with only one adjustable parameter. In this case, we find the maximum mass becomes 1.85 solar mas

Title: Deriving Neutron Star Equation of State from AdS/QCD
Abstract: arXiv:2403.20240v2 Announce Type: replace-cross  Abstract: Neutron stars are among the main targets for gravitational wave observatories, however, their equation of state is still not well established. In arXiv:1902.08477, a theoretical equation of state with only one parameter is derived from Witten-Sakai-Sugimoto model, as an application of AdS/QCD, where pointlike instanton case is taken into consideration. When the tidal deformability constraint from gravitational wave event is satisfied, the maximum mass is about 1.7 solar masses. tldr: 该文章利用AdS/QCD理论，通过升级模型到包含更多变量的瞬子气体，获得了关于中子星等离子体的更为准确和复杂的方程，这仅通过一个可调参数来描述。
